General.Name: Southern Steel Bhd
General.Description: Southern Steel Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures, sells, and trades in steel bars and related products in Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, the United States, Australia, Taiwan, Papua New Guinea, and internationally. It offers cold heading, bolt and nut, high and low carbon, and welding wire rods and billets, as well as spun pile wire rods; construction, and cut and bent bars, as well as deformed bars in coil; and standard sheet, engineered, and cut to size steel mesh products, as well as fencing panels and concrete wire products. The company also provides prestressed concrete strands and wires, as well as steel pipes. In addition, it is involved in the rental of properties. The company was incorporated in 1963 and is based in Perai, Malaysia.
